text: Taurai kuti (Imi maMuslim): “Tinotenda muna Allah neizvo zvakatumirwa kwatiri nezvakatumirwa kuna Ibrahim (Abrahamu), Ismail (Ishumaeri), Ishaaq (Isaka), Ya’qoob (Jakobho), uye kuAl-Asbaat (vana vevana gumi nevaviri vaYa’qoob (Jakobho)), uye izvo zvakapihwa Musa na Isa (Jesu), uye neizvo zvakapihwa kumaporofita kubva kuna Tenzi vavo. Hatisiyanise pakati pavo, uye kwavari (Allah) tinozvipira (muIslaam).”
